-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Parser and request Library for USB HIDs
--   
@package usb-hid
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Notice that <a>LongItem</a>s are not supported as none are specified
--   on the <a>USB Human Interface device page</a>
module System.USB.HID.Descriptor
data HIDDescriptor
HIDDescriptor :: !Word8 -> !Version -> !Word8 -> !Word8 -> !Word8 -> !Int -> !(Maybe Word8) -> !(Maybe Word8) -> HIDDescriptor
hIDDescriptorType :: HIDDescriptor -> !Word8
hIDcdHID :: HIDDescriptor -> !Version
hIDCountryCode :: HIDDescriptor -> !Word8
hIDNumDesc :: HIDDescriptor -> !Word8
hIDDescType :: HIDDescriptor -> !Word8
hIDDescLength :: HIDDescriptor -> !Int
hIDDescType' :: HIDDescriptor -> !(Maybe Word8)
hIDDescLength' :: HIDDescriptor -> !(Maybe Word8)
newtype HIDReportDesc
HIDReport :: [HIDReportItem] -> HIDReportDesc
data HIDPhysicalDescriptor
PD :: !HIDDesignator -> !HIDQualifier -> !HIDEffort -> HIDPhysicalDescriptor
data HIDReportItem
HIDReportS :: !ShortItem -> HIDReportItem
HIDReportL :: !LongItem -> HIDReportItem
data ShortItem
Main :: !HIDMainTag -> ShortItem
Global :: !HIDGlobalTag -> ShortItem
Local :: !HIDLocalTag -> ShortItem
newtype LongItem
Long :: () -> LongItem
data HIDMainTag
Input :: !HIDMainData -> HIDMainTag
Output :: !HIDMainData -> HIDMainTag
Feature :: !HIDMainData -> HIDMainTag
Collection :: !HIDCollectionData -> HIDMainTag
EndCollection :: HIDMainTag
data HIDMainData
HIDMainData :: !HDMBit0 -> !HDMBit1 -> !HDMBit2 -> !HDMBit3 -> !HDMBit4 -> !HDMBit5 -> !HDMBit6 -> !HDMBit8 -> HIDMainData
bit0 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit0
bit1 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit1
bit2 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit2
bit3 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit3
bit4 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit4
bit5 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit5
bit6 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit6
bit8 :: HIDMainData -> !HDMBit8
constructHIDMainD :: [Int] -> HIDMainData
data HDMBit0
Data :: HDMBit0
Constant :: HDMBit0
data HDMBit1
Array :: HDMBit1
Variable :: HDMBit1
data HDMBit2
Absolute :: HDMBit2
Relative :: HDMBit2
data HDMBit3
NoWrap :: HDMBit3
Wrap :: HDMBit3
data HDMBit4
Linear :: HDMBit4
NonLinear :: HDMBit4
data HDMBit5
PreferredState :: HDMBit5
NoPreferred :: HDMBit5
data HDMBit6
NoNullPosition :: HDMBit6
NullState :: HDMBit6
data HDMBit8
BitField :: HDMBit8
BufferedBytes :: HDMBit8
data HIDCollectionData
Physical :: HIDCollectionData
Application :: HIDCollectionData
Logical :: HIDCollectionData
Report :: HIDCollectionData
NamedArray :: HIDCollectionData
UsageSwitch :: HIDCollectionData
UsageModifier :: HIDCollectionData
data HIDGlobalTag
UsagePage :: !HIDUsagePage -> HIDGlobalTag
LogicalMinimum :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
LogicalMaximum :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
PhysicalMinimum :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
PhysicalMaximum :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
UnitExponent :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
Unit :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
ReportSize :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
ReportID :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
ReportCount :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
Push :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
Pop :: !Int -> HIDGlobalTag
data HIDLocalTag
Usage :: !HIDUsage -> HIDLocalTag
UsageMinimum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
UsageMaximum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
DesignatorIndex :: !HIDDesignator -> HIDLocalTag
DesignatorMinimum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
DesignatorMaximum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
StringIndex :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
StringMinimum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
StringMaximum :: !Int -> HIDLocalTag
Delimiter :: !HIDDelimeter -> HIDLocalTag
data HIDDelimeter
Open :: HIDDelimeter
Close :: HIDDelimeter
newtype HIDUsagePage
UP :: Int -> HIDUsagePage
newtype HIDUsage
U :: Int -> HIDUsage
data HIDDesignator
None :: HIDDesignator
Hand :: HIDDesignator
Eyeball :: HIDDesignator
Eyebrow :: HIDDesignator
Eyelid :: HIDDesignator
Ear :: HIDDesignator
Nose :: HIDDesignator
Mouth :: HIDDesignator
UpperLip :: HIDDesignator
LowerLip :: HIDDesignator
Jaw :: HIDDesignator
Neck :: HIDDesignator
UpperArm :: HIDDesignator
Elbow :: HIDDesignator
Forearm :: HIDDesignator
Wrist :: HIDDesignator
Palm :: HIDDesignator
Thumb :: HIDDesignator
IndexFinger :: HIDDesignator
MiddleFinger :: HIDDesignator
RingFinger :: HIDDesignator
LittleFinger :: HIDDesignator
Head :: HIDDesignator
Shoulder :: HIDDesignator
Hip :: HIDDesignator
Waist :: HIDDesignator
Thigh :: HIDDesignator
Knee :: HIDDesignator
Calf :: HIDDesignator
Ankle :: HIDDesignator
Foot :: HIDDesignator
Heel :: HIDDesignator
BallOfFoot :: HIDDesignator
BigToe :: HIDDesignator
SecondToe :: HIDDesignator
ThirdToe :: HIDDesignator
FourthToe :: HIDDesignator
LittleToe :: HIDDesignator
Brow :: HIDDesignator
Cheek :: HIDDesignator
data HIDQualifier
QNotApplicable :: HIDQualifier
RightSide :: HIDQualifier
LeftSide :: HIDQualifier
BothSides :: HIDQualifier
Either :: HIDQualifier
Center :: HIDQualifier
data HIDBias
BNotApplicable :: HIDBias
RightHand :: HIDBias
LeftHand :: HIDBias
BothHands :: HIDBias
EitherHand :: HIDBias
data HIDPhysDescSet
PDS :: !HIDBias -> !HIDPreference -> ![HIDPhysicalDescriptor] -> HIDPhysDescSet
type HIDEffort = Int
type HIDPreference = Int
data Version
V :: !Int -> !Int -> Version
main :: Version -> !Int
minor :: Version -> !Int
instance Eq LongItem
instance Show LongItem
instance Generic LongItem

module System.USB.HID.Parsers

-- | Parse a <a>HIDDescriptor</a>
parseHIDDesc :: Parser HIDDescriptor

-- | Parse a <a>HIDPhysDescSet</a>
parsePhysDescSet :: Parser HIDPhysDescSet

-- | Parse a <a>HIDReportDesc</a>
parseHIDReportDesc :: Parser HIDReportDesc

-- | <tt>parseInt n</tt> parses an <tt>Int</tt> of length encoded in
--   <tt>n</tt> <tt>Word8'</tt>s
parseInt :: Int -> Parser Int
convertEnum :: (Enum a, Enum b) => a -> b

module System.USB.HID.Requests
data HIDDescriptorClass
data HIDControlRequest
data HIDProtocol
type DescriptorIndex = Word8
type HIDInterfaceNumber = Word16
type Duration = Word8
type ReportID = Word8
type Report = ByteString
data ReportType

-- | Performs <a>Class</a> request for the HID report descriptor using the
--   Control pipe
getHIDReportDesc :: DeviceHandle -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Size -> Timeout -> IO HIDReportDesc

-- | Performs <a>Class</a> request for a HID Physical Descriptor set using
--   the Control pipe
getPhysicalDescriptor :: DeviceHandle -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> DescriptorIndex -> Size -> Timeout -> IO HIDPhysDescSet

-- | The GetReport request allows the host to receive a report via the
--   Control pipe.
getReport :: DeviceHandle -> ReportType -> ReportID -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Size -> Timeout -> IO (ByteString, Status)

-- | The SetReport request allows the host to send a report to the device,
--   possibly setting the state of input, output, or feature controls.
setReport :: DeviceHandle -> ReportType -> ReportID -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Report -> Timeout -> IO (Size, Status)

-- | The GetIdle request reads the current idle rate for a particular Input
--   report
getIdle :: DeviceHandle -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> ReportID -> Timeout -> IO (HIDProtocol, Status)

-- | The SetIdle request silences a particular report on the Interrupt In
--   pipe until a new event occurs or the specified amount of time passes.
setIdle :: DeviceHandle -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Duration -> ReportID -> Timeout -> IO (Size, Status)

-- | The GetProtocol request reads which protocol is currently active
--   (either the boot protocol or the report protocol.)
getProtocol :: DeviceHandle -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Timeout -> IO (HIDProtocol, Status)

-- | The SetProtocol switches between the boot protocol and the report
--   protocol (or vice versa).
setProtocol :: DeviceHandle -> HIDProtocol -> HIDInterfaceNumber -> Timeout -> IO (Size, Status)
instance Eq HIDDescriptorClass
instance Show HIDDescriptorClass
instance Generic HIDDescriptorClass
instance Eq HIDControlRequest
instance Show HIDControlRequest
instance Generic HIDControlRequest
instance Eq HIDProtocol
instance Show HIDProtocol
instance Enum HIDProtocol
instance Generic HIDProtocol
instance Eq ReportType
instance Show ReportType
instance Generic ReportType
instance Datatype D1HIDDescriptorClass
instance Constructor C1_0HIDDescriptorClass
instance Constructor C1_1HIDDescriptorClass
instance Constructor C1_2HIDDescriptorClass
instance Datatype D1HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_0HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_1HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_2HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_3HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_4HIDControlRequest
instance Constructor C1_5HIDControlRequest
instance Datatype D1HIDProtocol
instance Constructor C1_0HIDProtocol
instance Constructor C1_1HIDProtocol
instance Datatype D1ReportType
instance Constructor C1_0ReportType
instance Constructor C1_1ReportType
instance Constructor C1_2ReportType
instance Enum HIDDescriptorClass
instance Enum ReportType
instance Enum HIDControlRequest
